name: El Líder
description:
El líder is a prototype game.

You control Simón Viridiano a boy who wants to break free from the dictatorship of his country, the goal in this prototype is to escape the forest.
We honestly had several goals to put in the game, but due to the time we could not.
In the next days we will put
-music
-IA
-Cutscenes
-UI screens
-health bar

Thanks for Playing our prototype.

#WeeklyGameJam

theme: Zero to hero

Sprites and visual itens - Vinicius santos rocha.

Scripting and other things - Kauê Silva.
